Submodules¶

neurosynth.version module¶

Specifies current version of NeuroSynth to be used by setup.py and __init__.py

Module contents¶

NeuroSynth – large-scale synthesis of functional neuroimaging data.

neurosynth.set_logging_level(level=None)[source]¶

Set neurosynth’s logging level

Args
level : str
Name of the logging level (warning, error, info, etc) known to logging module. If no level provided, it would get that one from environment variable NEUROSYNTH_LOGLEVEL
